title: Access Request: John Doe
body:
### Full Name
John Doe

### Email Address
john.doe@company.com

### Preferred Username
JOHN_DOE

### What type of user are you?
Person - Human user

### Primary Role
Data Analyst - Business intelligence and reporting

### Expected Workload
Light - Ad-hoc queries and analysis (< 100 queries/day)

### Why do you need access?
I need access to Snowflake to analyze customer behavior data for our Q4 marketing campaigns. I'll be working with the Analytics team to create segmentation models and generate weekly reports for the marketing department.

Specific requirements:
- Access to CUSTOMER_DB for demographic data
- Ability to run aggregation queries
- Export data for visualization in Tableau

Expected usage: 2-3 hours per week, primarily on Tuesdays and Thursdays.

### Project/Team
Marketing Analytics Team

### Manager Email
manager@company.com

### Urgency Level
Standard - Can wait for normal processing (3-5 business days)

### Urgency Justification
_No response_

### RSA Public Key (Optional)
_No response_

### Additional Comments
I've completed the data handling training and have my certificate. I understand the data retention policies and will follow all security protocols.

### Acknowledgments
- [x] I understand that I will have access to sensitive business data and agree to follow all data handling policies
- [x] I have read and agree to the acceptable use policy
- [x] I will report any suspicious activity or security concerns to the security team immediately
